description:
Very cozy apartment with high ceilings in a perfectly convenient location, on a quiet tree-lined street. Recently renovated and includes a fire place! A block away from metro, with food markets, Prospect Park, indoor climbing wall, bars, restaurants, 24-hour shops, Botanical Gardens... you name it, it's here. 

The apartment is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Please fee free to reach and ask any questions. See you soon.

Extremely comfortable and relaxing apartment, with open plan kitchen, bright sunny windows and high celilings

they will have access to the entier place

Here to help throughout your stay

Getting around the neighborhood and into Manhattan is a very easy
name: Charming, Cozy & Convenient 1 Bd Apartment
